ðŸ“– Summary: Vibe Kanban is a Kanban board designed to manage AI coding agents. It allows users to easily switch between agents, orchestrate their execution, review their work, track task status, and centralize configuration. The primary use case is to streamline the software development process by effectively managing AI-powered coding assistance.
